attributes.action: The New Year Honours list for 2021 be dedicated to NHS, Key Workers & Scientists
attributes.additional_details:
To say thanks to these individuals on behalf of the nation. Without them imagine what state the Country would be in, and how many more people might not have recovered from the virus.
Film stars, Sports people and politicians can miss a year for once.
attributes.background: Use the New Year Honours list to exclusively recognise the service, commitment and bravery of NHS, Key workers (including the Armed Services) and Scientists during the COVID pandemic in 2020 and 2021.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept petitions about honours or appointments. The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/

There is a separate form for nominating someone for an honour for coronavirus-related work: https://www.gov.uk/honours/nominate-someone-for-coronavirus-work
